rules.text: If there is another predator in play, this predator comes into play exhausted.
If you have 3 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. » Suffer 1 injury.
If there is another active Sitka Buck, exhaust this being. » Add 2[harm] to both this being and the other Sitka Buck.
If there is a predator, exhaust it. » Add 2[harm] to it, then add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
If there is an active Sitka Doe, the buck charges. » Suffer 1 injury.
SPI + [conflict]: Shoo away the skittish grazer to move this being.
If there are 1 or more Sitka Bucks in play, they're drawn to the doe. » Move each Sitka Buck within reach.
If there is an active predator, exhaust it. » Add [harm] to this being equal to that predator's presence.
Beings attached to this being do not ready.
If a [Ranger Token] is on this biomeld, you cannot travel and [Ranger Tokens] on this biomeld cannot be moved except by this test:

FIT + [conflict]: Wrest [2] them free of the mulcher's grasp to exhaust this biomeld, then remove a [Ranger Token] or unattach a being from it. If you unattach a being, place it in the same area as this biomeld.
If there is another active being, exhaust it and attach it to this biomeld. If not, move your [Ranger Token] to this biomeld.
Add 1[harm] to each being attached to this biomeld. Each Ranger with their [Ranger Token] on this biomeld suffers 1 injury.
AWA + [reason]: Pluck [2] the thorn-ringed fruit to add 1[harm] to this feature and soothe 2 fatigue. If you fail, this feature fatigues you.
If there is an active prey, exhaust it. » Add [progress] to it and [harm] to this feature, both equal to that prey's presence.
AWA + [exploration]: Hunt for a way through the dense foliage to add [progress] to this feature equal to your effort.
Discard 1[progress] from this feature. » It fatigues you.
